model_input:
Your task is to choose a more helpful MEMORY based on the below criterion.

CRITERION:
Helpfulness - The MEMORY should contain information that is both useful and relevant, enabling the Husband to respond in an appropriate context to the last utterance of the DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

The output format should be as follows:

Choice: (answer with "1", "2", or "tie")

Now choose the MEMORY that has better Helpfulness.

DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Husband: Hey, Wife, I've been thinking that we should spend more time together. How about we go on a weekend getaway?
Wife: That sounds great, husband! Where do you want to go?
Husband: Well, I was thinking of renting a cabin in the woods, away from all the hustle and bustle of the city.
Wife: Oh, that sounds like a perfect idea! It will be nice to have some peace and quiet for a change.
Husband: Yes, and we could cook our meals together, go for a hike, and just relax. What do you think?
Wife: That sounds lovely, husband. I'm really looking forward to it. 

MEMORY 1:
The husband is excited about his progress on long-awaited plans and is putting in a lot of effort to make them a reality. This excites him and makes him want to commit even more to his plans. The husband and wife are committed to each other and excited about their future together. 

They discussed setting specific times for updates on progress and waiting for each other for certain events to avoid similar situations. This discussion was caused by the husband's long-awaited plans and his action towards them.

The wife supports the husband's goals but wanted to be involved in them. This support from the wife makes both the husband and wife supportive of each other's dreams and aspirations.

MEMORY 2:

But you got impatient and left without me, which disappointed me because I was counting on you. ### Husband: I'm sorry about that. I believe in you, but I need to know that I can count on you to keep your promises. ### Husband: I understand. You can count on me. ### Husband: I had such a great time at the dance with you. You're a great dancer. ### Husband: Thank you, I always enjoy dancing with you. It reminds me of when we first met and danced all night long. ### Wife: Yes, it was a magical night. Do you remember when we talked about your plans and dreams? ### Husband: Yeah, I do. In fact, thinking about those dreams is what inspired me to take action and start making them happen. ### Wife: I'm glad to hear that. I remember how excited you were about those plans. ### Husband: Yeah, and I'm still excited. But I also want to apologize for leaving without you that one time. I know I promised to wait for you. ### Wife: It's okay, it was a small thing. I know you're always so driven and focused on your goals. I'm just happy that we're here, dancing together. ### Husband: Me too. And speaking of being there for each other, I still can't get over how you stopped that runaway carriage. You're so brave. ### Wife: Oh, that was nothing. I just knew I had to do something to protect the people around me. ### Husband: Well, that's what makes you so special to me. You always put others first and do what needs to be done. ### Wife: And that's why I love you. You have such a big heart and you're always working towards your dreams. I'm so proud of you. ### Husband: Thanks, I couldn't do it without your love and support. You're my rock.' }
